verbs.description: As [V: evidenced] [ARG0: by the political ascendance of Donald Trump and Ronald Reagan] , having a background in the entertainment industry can be a plus for a political figure .
As evidenced by the political ascendance of Donald Trump and Ronald Reagan , [V: having] [ARG1: a background in the entertainment industry] can be a plus for a political figure .
As evidenced by the political ascendance of Donald Trump and Ronald Reagan , having a background in the entertainment industry [V: can] be a plus for a political figure .
